com.wessles.MERCury

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wessles.MERCury.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that will run your core, and give out the graphics object, current core, resource manager, and input staticly.
    Author:
    wessles
